rationale: 'extensive testing' contains an intensifier ('extensive') modifying a noun ('testing'), not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: A 10-kilometer (6.2-mile) control area has been established to limit traffic in and out of the area while extensive testing is done to ensure no other cases, said State Veterinarian Dr. Jeff Kaisand.
